llm_res.rule: totalSupply: Returns the total token supply.
decimals: Returns the number of decimals the token uses.
transfer: Transfers _value amount of tokens to address _to, and MUST fire the Transfer event. Note Transfers of 0 values MUST be treated as normal transfers and fire the Transfer event.

transferFrom: Transfers _value amount of tokens from address _from to address _to, and MUST fire the Transfer event. Note Transfers of 0 values MUST be treated as normal transfers and fire the Transfer event.
